name: 8.15 and 8.16 "Finally!" Parts 1 and 2 Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who did the gang say Frasier's baby looked most like: Frasier or Lilith?
questions.explanation:
Lilith.

	Frasier showed the gang pictures of Lilith and himself when they were babies. They all decided the baby looked more like Lilith. Carla said she meant it and was not just taking a shot at Frasier. Frasier said it was only natural he should look like his mother because she carried him for nine months.

questions.text: What song did Frasier say was the best car song?
questions.explanation:
GTO.

	Frasier said when you heard "GTO" "You're burning rubber."  "GTO" is a song by Ronny and the Daytonas that came out in 1964.

questions.text: Who did Robin invite to the Carl Yaztremski dinner?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Robin said he knew nothing about baseball and needed Sam to brief him before the dinner. Rebecca was very upset that Sam was joining them as she wanted to be alone with him.

questions.text: Why did Carla say Rebecca put up with Robin's tardiness?
questions.explanation:
She was a gold digger.

	Rebecca has always wanted a man with a lot of money. She wasn't shy about it either, everyone knew she was a gold digger, so when Carla called her out on it, she had no choice but to agree.

questions.text: What did the people who knew Carl Yaztremski call him?
questions.explanation:
Yaz.

	Carl Yaztremski "Yaz" was born August 22, 1939. He played his entire 23 year baseball career with the Boston Red Sox (1961-1983). Since Sam was a relief pitcher for the Red Sox during the end of Yaz's career he knew him.

questions.text: What happened with Rebecca that surprised and thrilled everyone?
questions.explanation:
She slept with Robin.

	The gang at Cheers have no lives of their own so they get easily excited when something happens to someone else. Also, they were running a pool as to when she would finally sleep with him.

questions.text: How did Sam get Rebecca out of Little Wally's Pup n Burger's without her seeing Robin?
questions.correct: Put his coat over her head and led her out of the restaurant
options: Had her climb out a window
Put a handkerchief over her eyes
questions.explanation:
Put his coat over her head and led her out of the restaurant.

	He went into the woman's bathroom where Rebecca was cleaning a grease stain out of her skirt and told her the restaurant was on fire. At first he tried to have her climb out the window but she didn't fit. So, he put the coat over her head and led her out. Rebecca told the gang at Cheers that "the flames were so hot I could feel them licking my ears".

questions.text: How did Robin get Sam to keep quiet about Robin's cheating on Rebecca?
questions.correct: Made a deal to buy back Cheers for Sam
options: Threatened Sam with some knowledge he had on Sam
questions.explanation:
Made a deal to buy back Cheers for Sam.

	Sam agreed not to say anything but felt bad about it. However, he really wanted the bar back.

questions.text: What did Sam write on the back of the napkin?
questions.explanation:
"I feel bad."

	When he told Robin he felt bad, Robin said he could have that printed on his cocktail napkins. A little later, when asked how he felt Sam wrote on the napkin "I feel bad."

questions.text: Did Sam ever tell Rebecca that Robin was cheating on her?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Sam's guilt led him to tell Rebecca the truth. At first, she didn't believe him and accused him of being jealous. However, later she caught Robin with another woman. She was going to leave him at first, but then he gave her a very expensive bracelet which convinced her to stay and fight for him.
